answers.answer: not sure. I have osteo arthritis of my left knee, inside. The padding is getting worn off. I don't have the exact symptoms, but my knee hurts when I kneel on it. Have you gone for an MRI or x-ray? That would make sense to do so.

Yes I would have gone for an MRI but chose to come here hoping to find someone with a similiar problem, we are retired after 35 years with the same co. not old enough for medicare & victims of corporate greed...Thanks for answering my post....
SCIATICA NEVERE (LOWER BACK PROBLEMS...INJURY) OR TRY GETTING CHECKED FOR DIABETES....MY RIGHT KNEE GETS A TINGILY FEELING WHEN I AM PREGNANT...I CANT TELL THIS WHEN I SIT ON THE TOILET! LOL

question: My right knee & on the right side in the soft part feels numb & if I get it against anything or kneel on the floor on my knee it feels like I put my knee on something sharp or it can feel like I put it on a nails & it can really hurt, I can rub my knee I can touch my knee firmly, even smack it & it does not bother it, it only shows these symptoms when I get against something or  kneel down on it, its weird but its me so it would be.lol.. I thought maybe a form of neuritis but I don't know, I did nothing to my knee to cause this...Sometimes if I get against something in a certain way I feel the sensation of something rolling inside I want to say like a vein maybe...It is just weird... If I run my fingers over the spot it feels numb...I am just curious about it.....Thanks...Lee
title: Unusual Knee pain
